      • filterTags

        public static String filterTags(String aString)
        This method removes the XSL-tags that are contained in FrameNet's files
        Parameters:
        aString - String containing XSL-tags
        Returns:
        String without XSL-tags

      • getPOS

        public static EPartOfSpeech getPOS(de.saar.coli.salsa.reiter.framenet.PartOfSpeech pos)
        This method consumes a part of speech, defined by API used for parsing FrameNet's files,
        and returns the associated part of speech defined in Uby-LMF
        Parameters:
        pos - part of speech defined in PartOfSpeech
        Returns:
        Uby's EPartOfSpeech that is associated with the consumed pos

      • booleanForHumans

        public static EYesNo booleanForHumans(boolean bool)
        Consumes a boolean value and returns associated value in EYesNo
        Parameters:
        bool - a boolean value
        Returns:
        EYesNo.yes if bool is true, EYesNo.no otherwise

      • getCoreType

        public static ECoreType getCoreType(de.saar.coli.salsa.reiter.framenet.CoreType coreType)
        Consumes a core type, defined in API used for parsing FrameNet's files and returns the associated core type defined in Uby-LMF
        Parameters:
        coreType - core type defined in CoreType
        Returns:
        Uby's ECoreType that is associated with the consumed coreType

      • getRelName

        public static String getRelName(String frameNetRelationName,
                de.saar.coli.salsa.reiter.framenet.FrameNetRelationDirection direction)
        Consumes a name of frame relation and relation's direction, as defined in API used for parsing FrameNet's files and returns the associated relation name of Uby's PredicateRelation
        Parameters:
        frameNetRelationName - FrameNet's relation name
        direction - the direction of the relation
        Returns:
        name of Uby's PredicateRelation, that corresponds to the consumed frameNetRelationName and the direction
        See Also:
        Frame}, FrameNetRelationDirection}
